text: We ’ ve all had a laugh at the results that tend to come out of Google Translate, especially when going from English to another language and then back to English. Recognizing the search engine ’ s comedy potential when it comes to song lyrics, Jimmy Fallon filtered through some classic hits so his Colossal guest, Anne Hathaway, could sing Google Translate versions on Monday ’ s The Tonight Show. When fed through Google Translate and back again, The Weeknd ’ s “ Can ’ t Feel My Face ” becomes the popular track “ My Front Is Not Felt ” with the refrain, “ In your presence, my front is not felt. Hey, it is good. Hey, it is good. ” Gloria Gaynor ’ s “ I Will Survive ” becomes “ I Will Be Punct
